name: company (Eva Vital)
description:
Interactive audiovisual experience about how the company you keep can make you feel at home (or not).
Created for Global Game Jam 2019.

Using headphones is recommended.

Instructions: click on the squares to activate or deactivate them. Experiment with different combinations. Enjoy (or not) the mood.

Credits:
Design, programming - Eva Vital (me)
Audio - Gabriela Marramaque
